meanings.definition: The end part of a long bone, initially growing separately from the shaft.
meanings.sent1: The epiphyses of the bone help in bone growth.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the epiphyses to understand bone development.
meanings.sent3: The epiphyses decided to have a party at the end of the bone.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like the epiphyses of a story, adding depth and complexity.
meanings.sent5: The epiphyses, like tiny buds, hold the potential for future bone growth.
